Name: Lovely Heroines
About the game: New Dork City is in danger! A dangerous alien overlord arrived and is threatening to enslave all humanity! Only a very powerful hero will be able to save us! Are you ready? However, the only way to increase your power is to search other Heroines and have fun with them! Meet as many as you can and save the city! A sexy parody of superhero comics and movies, where you must search multiple Heroines to stop a powerful evil villain. Features 5 different sexy Heroines. 5 different endings. Erotic comedy. Unique comic book inspired artwork. Funny superhero parody. Gameplay Different endings based on your choices. Non linear story.
